obs.how_to_title: Where can i find these values?
obs.how_to1: On OBS, open to "Tools => obs-websocket Settings".
obs.how_to2: You'll probably want to leave the IP to {IP}
obs.ip_advice: You may want to set the IP to 127.0.0.1 instead of what OBS shows you
obs.disable_brave:
Brave users
You need to disable Brave Shields for the connection to work
obs.header: Create your own twitch alerts, allow your mods basic control over your OBS and much more
obs.install: In order to work, this needs {OBS_VERSION}
obs.permissions_head: Users allowed to use the chat commands
obs.microphone_head: Give control over your microphone so some users can mute or unmute you from the chat
obs.scenes_empty: You have no scene on OBS
